<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Phantom Beast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1264)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The River of Souls, alongside the souls of dead sapient humanoids, also carries the spirits of monsters, animals, and other creatures. Likewise, it draws souls from the broad universe of the [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1), and thus human and elf souls mingle with those of far stranger creatures from untold worlds. Like any others, these far-flung spirits of strange creatures sometimes wash up on the shores of the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9), becoming phantoms far removed from the humanoid forms typically associated with [ghosts](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=51) and other [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).

 The phantom below is one such entity: a strange beast from a distant world, echoing their behaviors from life as they search for their own fate post-mortem. Their unfamiliar appearance might lead observers to assume they're a monstrous being and attack, finding the phantom beast entirely willing to fight back. More compassionate adventurers might instead seek to help the phantom find their way back to the River of Souls to complete their spiritual journey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ethereal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 26

**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Phantom_PhantomBeast.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Phantom Beast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1264)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ethereal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=63" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Phantom" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=361" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=149" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 203</row>

**Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +14, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +18

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +6

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Walk the Ethereal Line** <actions string="Two Actions" /> The phantom walks the thin line between the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=9) and [Material Planes](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) in order to exist on both planes simultaneously. They can shift back to solely the Ethereal Plane by using this ability again.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +16 

–1 status penalty to all saves vs. [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects
</row>

**HP** 120

**Immunities**
[disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision

**Resistances**
all damage 8 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) or [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Susceptible to Death** Though phantoms aren't alive, neither are they [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), and they are uniquely vulnerable to the effects of death. A phantom whose Hit Points are reduced to 0 as a result of a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effect (such as from a spell like [_finger of death_](/Spells.aspx?ID=116)) is immediately whisked away to the River of Souls, where their soul resumes the usual path to the afterlife.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
phantom horn +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 force

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 28, attack +20
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **4th**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)

**Grab Item** <actions string="Single Action" />  The phantom beast attempts to [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68) one item of up to 1 Bulk from a creature, even if the creature is in combat, though the object still must not be one that is actively in use. If they succeed, they carry the object along with them telekinetically

</column>
